overview: Peter was CEO of Findware, a market leading GPS/GSM business intelligence company sold to Romtrac Plc in 2008. Peter brings unique technical experience in application development, GPS location based devices and mission critical web development. From 2002 to 2004, he was a consultant to Betfair, Lloyds and Sportingbet with senior technical positions. From 2000 to 2002, Peter was CTO of Webvertiser. Peter was Head of Internet at Bank of America from 1992 to 2000.
